Naturally, she had employees who were driven just as she had been, but she felt herself heartbroken when she realized she hadn’t anymore those same motivations.

Then, one day, she saw this plump young woman entering her gym. Instead of the common clients who usually came in there to grow buff and strong, this woman seemed driven to grow as thin and fit as possible. Jessie found herself fascinated by this girl, so much so that often she found herself training beside her, under the disguise of being a new client and not the owner of the place. Her employees helped keeping the ruse, they had noticed the lack of motivation from their boss and, seeing as she seemed to be gaining back her old driven mind was a boost for their confidence.

After a few months of training together, Jessica had learned quite a bit about the girl with which she was training. They had soon grown closer, under many aspects thinking alike, and so a friendship started although, Jessie hadn’t revealed herself yet.

Susan was a plump young woman, she had just abandoned her studies at her college, deciding by herself that her dream of becoming a teacher was just that…a dream. Returning to her home stead of Whitesands she found a small job as secretary in one of the local companies and she maintained herself there but, sitting down all day long had started to have a negative effect on her waist. The freshman fifteen, which she had been found herself under, began to grow becoming soon the freshman thirty.

To slow down or, maybe, even change the trend she joined the local gym and began doing some light exercises all by herself. Soon enough though, as weeks passed by, she often found herself training near a girl which she could only describe as an Amazonian goddess. The girl seemed to be an expert on the fitness side of things, and, under her tutelage, Susie began to grow healthier and toned than she ever was. As months passed away, the two of them began to be close friends and, although, her friend was a tad intimidating at times, Susie knew she could trust her with her life.

As time passed their friendship grew as well, until Jessie couldn’t hold her secret in anymore. She had to tell the truth to Susan, especially since she considered her one of her closest friends.

One evening, as the gym was pretty empty, and only the two of them were there, Susie came out of the shower stall, clean as a whistle and with her wet hair still enclosed in some towels. As she entered the locker room, she saw her friend Jess, sitting on a bench, looking rather down and sad.

“Jess? Everything alright?”

The Amazonian trainer sighed once more, before turning a sad smile toward the girl which she had befriended so easily.

“H-Hey Susie…It’s… It’s alright. Everything is…who am I kidding? Look, can you…could you sit down here for a minute, will ya?”

Susan, increasingly getting worried for her friend, quickly sat beside her, caressing her shoulder with a hand as she waited for her friend to tell her what was going on.

“You see, Susie…All this time, all these months…I’ve been a terrible friend.”

“What are you saying? Now, Jess don’t say anything like that. You know it’s not true.”

“It is. Look, I’ve been lying to you all this time and I can’t keep the ruse up anymore. I just can’t.”

As Jessie said that she rose from the bleachers and stood against the locker, both hands against it as her head hung down in shame. Susan was getting worried, what could have happened to let her usually strong and fiery friend to feel this ashamed. Still, she silently waited for her friend to open herself up.

Jessie, stood silent for a moment and then, breathing deeply, she turned toward her friend getting everything out.

“Susie, have you ever wondered why we were able to stay so late here in the gym? Haven’t you ever noticed that nobody seemed to be interested in the two of us, not even the trainers? Didn’t’ seem strange to you that I haven’t once used my card to come and go from the Gym?

The truth, Susie, is that I lied to you. My name’s not Jess Burgess. I’m Jessica Horowitz. I’m the owner of this gym…and…in all this time…all I did was lie to you. I was feeling lonely, training didn’t seem to be that much invigorating for me, anymore.

Then I saw you coming in, the way you tried your best, the attitude with which you passed each day here to try and train yourself from scratch…That got me all fired up. But I was afraid. I couldn’t come to you, revealing myself to be the owner, and expect you to treat me as a normal training buddy. So, I lied. And I kept my real identity secret to you for all this time…

But…I can’t…I can’t keep holding this within me.

I…I’ll leave you alone now…I…I know I shouldn’t have lied to you but…it doesn’t matter anymore…”

As soon as she finished speaking, seeing that Susie was still staring at her in shock, Jessie turned around and began to slump away, but as soon as she had turned her back on Susan, the same stood from the bench and rushed forward, hugging Jessie from behind.

“Did you really think you lied to me? For all this time?

Oh, Jess, I’ve always known you were the owner. Well, maybe not the first time we met, but after then, I saw your picture hung up on the reception wall. I may not be the smartest gal around but, I’m not that dizzy yet.

And why would you even try to lie to me? Do you really think that I would care for something like that?
Come on, you know me better than that.

Now, Partner, why don’t we go out tonight. Let’s close this issue with some beers. Nothing better than cheap alcohol to close this kind of situations…what do you…*oof*…?”

Just as Susan was finishing her speech, Jessie closed on her and hugged her with all her might, as the other girl simply shushed her and soothed her.

Since then the two made of it an habit to have one night a week of meeting up in pubs and wasting themselves away on alcohol. In a few months, though, as their friendship grew closer, something happened that would mark a turning change in their lives. It was their cheat day and they had passed the whole evening wasting themselves until they both reached a point where they simply couldn’t stand anymore. In their drunken state, Susan joined Jessie in her flat, and they passed the night there.

That night, the two of them shared the same bed and as the night became morning, they soon realized that they didn’t simply sleep together, but did so much more. The more shocked of the two was Jessie, she couldn’t believe that she had done it again. She couldn’t remember much but, she thought of having forced herself on her friend and this, once more, brought her down. But when morning came, and Susie rose from the bed, joining her in the kitchen, Jessie didn’t know what to expect from the girl standing behind her.

Tom’s wife had arrived already reduced to a wreck, Sophie had simply helped her to forget about her past and make herself a new future. She knew that when food was in front of her, she had to eat it. She knew that when her belly grumbled, she had to eat more food and, she knew that when she felt so full,she could burst any moment, she had to eat some more.

Food had become her only goal in life.

In truth, Rebecca sometimes wondered why she was obeying that woman but, it was the right thing to do, she told herself.

But mainly she ate all she could because she had grown used to it.

She barely remembered anymore why she had come to that house or what her life was before arriving there. Something like her husband was a shadowy memory, something she knew she loved but of which she couldn’t see any detail.

Even her body had become secondary. She had grown so used in seeing so little of herself that no matter how big she was getting, she didn’t mind. Sophie kept telling her that she was a good girl and so she just kept at it.

Rebecca laid on the ground, propped against a wall since no chair could manage her immense weight, or her tremendous shape.

Tom’s wife had grown so huge that nothing could contain her anymore. Her body had even begun to lose its humanoid shape, resembling more and more a blob-like mass of fat. The last time Sophie managed to weight her she had grown past the 640 lbs, after that Rebecca had simply grown much too massive to be weighted again.

And yet, brain washed Rebecca was enjoying her life as a mindless glutton. That day, though, was special.

Rebecca laid there, sitting on two king sized mattresses, her back against the wall, while her humongous body surrounded her from every side, rendering her virtually immobile. Too unfit to lift herself from the ground, she just lay there, breathing quick short breaths each time, as her mass of belly apron barely moved from it. It jiggled and wobbled to and from, due to any micro movement she did.

She was feeling full. It was becoming rarer and rarer, for her to feel completely stuffed and overfilled, so full to not be able to eat a single more bite, no matter how hungry she was. But she trembled in both fear and joy when she saw Sophie coming toward her.

“So, how’s my little sow doing, uh? Are you growing out for Sophie?”

Rebecca could manage barely a grunt.

She felt so full and tired that even words seemed to be too much to ask to her. Yet, she moaned loudly as Sophie caressed her jelly like gut, as she pushed her hands into all that glorious belly fat, feeling it squishy under her fingers.

“You certainly are growing bigger and fatter for me…But is it enough?”

Sophie loved to play a bit with her two personal piggies. But now, seeing Rebecca too big to do anything but rest, she needed more than simple play.

“No it isn’t, little sow. You still need to grow bigger for me.” Then, turning to some of her servants stationed nearby. “Why isn’t she eating?”

“She cannot have anymore, Miss. She’s full…”

“I decide when Rebecca is full. And she isn’t right now. Bring her more.

Now!”

Rebecca wanted to please Sophie, but she still felt already overstuffed. And no matter how much food the servants brought to her, no matter how hard she tried to swallow, she couldn’t.

Sophie didn’t seem too pleased but, a sinister smile grew on her lips.

Before Rebecca could even think of react, one of the servants brough forward the contraption and fastened it tightly on her face, with the funnel ending right into her mouth. Becky tried to warn Sophie that she was afraid, but all came out was a brief gurgle.

Sophie, with another flick of her hand, quickly ordered the feeding machine to be started, as it began to pump pound after pound of a liquified meal into Rebecca.

Poor girl soon found herself filling up with pain and pleasure, as that strange goop began filling up ay nook and cranny inside of her fattened body. With surprising speed, her entire forms began to balloon, growing more and more in a rounded shape. Her belly especially, began to drag onward on the ground, as it grew wider and higher, filling up with the high calorie sludge.

As Rebecca filled up, so Sophie began to climb her enlarged gut, until she laid down on it, belly first, her aroused gaze directly into the lustful glazed eyes of Becky.

“Yes, grow more for me, my little sow. You’ll be my own bed from now on. And You shall be bigger each and every day. No matter your size, I’ll find a way to have you grow bigger and fatter.

Until you’ll grow bigger than your husband…Although he’ll also grow bigger each and every day.

Will you manage to outgrow him? Will you do it for me?”

And now, to the story:


Every story has a monster which is the personification of Evil, a malevolent creature bent on destruction of most characters surrounding it. Fine examples of such beasts are the monsters who lurks under the bed of kids and children. But it’s not always this the case.

George is a Monster with the hellish duty of lurking under children beds. He hadn’t been one for all of his life but, had steadily worked in Hell until he finally got promoted and assigned to lurk under their beds to scare them and instill terror and fear in their little hearts, which was then collected to resupply the dark energies powering the lowest level of Pandemonium, the Hell Capital.

He’s not evil per se, he’s just doing his job.

Nonetheless, when night came and he moved his scaly reptilian body out from under the bed, although it was pitch black in the room, he could see that something seemed amiss. He had gotten used to kids room, usually filled with toys and dollies, with stars and starships if the kid was a boy and with animals and castles if it belonged to a girl. But the room he was in that night was way different from any he had ever seen.

Posters with menacing figures on the walls, explosions painted on the ceiling, a lone mirror placed strategically to give the owner a full view of the room directly from the bed.

And there seemed to be only one color in that room.

Black.

Strange.

Still, George was here to do a job.

He had to scare and, possibly, eat whoever was sleeping on the bed. And he counted to do so.

Walking on all fours he began stalking toward the bed, like a tiger would do when hunting its prey, his almost reptilian body shimmered a bit under the moon light coming from the window, his barbed tail swishing behind him. Moving closer and closer to the bed he could see the faint outline of the figure under the covers, and through such tiny detail he figured out that she was a young girl sleeping, although not yet mature enough to ignore monsters such as himself.

Silently he moved closer, his claws extending from his front paws, as he readied himself to strike.

Right at that moment, though, the girl seemed to stir and, in the moment he took to freeze himself, he heard a surprised whisper and a quick movement coming from the bed. Growing worried, George moved closer and realized that his victim had managed to see him, somehow, and had applied the duvet tactic.

Growling in frustration he inched closer noticing that the duvet was extra thick and managed to create an impenetrable shield surrounding his would-be victim. George hated how kids were getting smarter and smarter these days. Somehow, thanks to some Intern Monster, probably, one kid had learned that Duvet covers were effective defenses against Monsters attacks.

From then on, all kids used this tactic to protect themselves.

As he got beside the bed he stared at the formidable shield that the girl was using noticing that it was a massively heavy thing, extra-long, which managed to reach almost down to the floor, making it impossible for him even to return under the bed.
But he suddenly noticed that there was a way for him to get at the girl.

As heavy as the duvet was, the girl breathing was still stable and that could only mean that she had a way to get oxygen from the outside. Walking around the bed he soon found that this girl had combined two defensive tactics into one, the first being the duvet bunkering, the second being the snorkeling technique.

Through the usage of a long snorkel, coming out of the impenetrable shield, she managed to get clean fresh air, even though she was covered entirely by the heavy duvet. With a smile on his lips, revealing his sharp razor like fangs, George moved closer to the tube, noticing how air came out of it and was sucked in and, at the same time, how the girl middle seemed to grow larger and smaller as she breathed.

This gave him an idea.

Opening his mouth wide and taking in as much air as he could, he suddenly closed his jaws on the tube creating with his lips a vacuum like seal around it, preventing any air to get out, with this done he breathed out into the tube with all of his might.

At first there was a bit of resistance but, after a few moments, he managed to overcome it and suddenly noticed how the girl middle suddenly grew bigger under the cover.

Knowing that in this way he could finally manage to get the girl to uncover herself from her shield indirectly he began pushing more and more air into the tube, watching with fascination how the girl figure began to swell, rising higher and higher, lifting the duvet bit by bit.

Feeling himself victorious, George, began to pump faster and faster into the tube, focusing only on pushing more and more air in the snorkel to finally get a chance at scaring the girl.

Meanwhile, the girl found herself unable to do anything. She had thought to be safe using the duvet and her dad’s snorkel but now something was pushing air into her through the same tube.

Slowly, the girl body began to grow, first her middle which started to get rounder, filling up with air, as it began to grow higher and higher, similar to a hill as it pulled the duvet from the floor as it rose up in the air. Then, slightly above that, two additional hills seemed to sprout suddenly, growing larger and wider, as a creaking sound started to fill the room as George kept pumping faster and faster.

The girl tried to move her arms, to free herself from the snorkeling tube but, under her heavy cover she realized she couldn’t manage to move freely and so could only hope that whatever was out there would stop sooner, rather than later.

George instead was feeling elated. He stole a quick glance toward the bed, where he could see that the figure on it was growing rounder and rounder, rising higher and higher, taking more and more of the heavy cover from the bed. Already he could see the tips of the toes emerging from under it and so, he re-doubled his efforts to pump even more air into his victim.

The girl, meanwhile, was growing massively round. Her body growing into a massive sphere, engulfing both her arms and legs as it expanded wider and wider, her breasts, tightly kept in check by her currently too tight bra, growing bigger and bigger as they inflated with each pumped bout of air coming from the snorkel still stuck in her mouth.

She closed her eyes, feeling like she couldn’t hold anymore within herself, as she tried both to cry and scream at the same time, unable to do either of them.

George, instead, kept pumping more and more, using all of his lungs power to aid him in his task, feeling excited since he already could see the duvet leaving unguarded the legs of his victim, and yet her face was still under it, protected from that impenetrable shield. If he could manage to pump a little bit more into her, just enough to uncover her face, he would have won this battle.

As he kept pushing more and more air into the massively gravid sphere that the girl had become, a loud creaking sound filled the room, sounding like a ticking bomb waiting for its sudden release.

Just as George was able to see the eyes of his victim getting freed from the heavy duvet, a loud ripping sound filled the room, quickly followed by a loud crackling sound as he suddenly was right in the middle of a massive explosion.

As the room returned silent, George stood beside the bed, his lips still closed to the snorkeling tube, laying uselessly in front of him.

He stared silently around the room trying to understand what had happened when a pair of red lacy bras flew down from the ceiling landing right on his head.
